thread.title: Great location in Latin Quarter
thread.title_full: Great location in Latin Quarter - Review of Hotel Royal Saint Michel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TheGreeneOne
title: Great location in Latin Quarter
text: Very convenient to St.Michel metro and RER B from the airport. Breakfast is not included but it is easy to find a special rate that does include breakfast. Rooms are comfortable and typical of Europe (slightly small but with everything you need) I have stayed at this hotel twice and would stay again.
